arguments.name: - (Required, string) Name of the server to create (must be unique per project and a valid hostname as per RFC 1123).

arguments.server_type: - (Required, string) Name of the server type this server should be created with.

arguments.image: - (Required, string) Name or ID of the image the server is created from.

arguments.location: - (Optional, string) The location name to create the server in. , or

arguments.datacenter: - (Optional, string) The datacenter name to create the server in.

arguments.user_data: - (Optional, string) Cloud-Init user data to use during server creation

arguments.ssh_keys: - (Optional, list) SSH key IDs or names which should be injected into the server at creation time

arguments.keep_disk: - (Optional, bool) If true, do not upgrade the disk. This allows downgrading the server type later.

arguments.iso: - (Optional, string) Name of an ISO image to mount.

arguments.rescue: - (Optional, string) Enable and boot in to the specified rescue system. This enables simple installation of custom operating systems. or

arguments.labels: - (Optional, map) User-defined labels (key-value pairs) should be created with.

arguments.name: - (Required, string) Name of the volume to create (must be unique per project).

arguments.size: - (Required, int) Size of the volume (in GB).

arguments.server: - (Optional, int) Server to attach the Volume to, optional if location argument is passed.

arguments.location: - (Optional, string) Location of the volume to create, optional if server_id argument is passed.

arguments.server_id: - (Required, int) Server to attach the Volume to.

arguments.name: - (Required, string) Name of the SSH key.

arguments.public_key: - (Required, string) The public key. If this is a file, it can be read using the file interpolation function

arguments.type: - (Required, string) Type of the Floating IP.

arguments.server_id: - (Optional, int) Server to assign the Floating IP to.

arguments.home_location: - (Optional, string) Home location (routing is optimized for that location). Optional if server_id argument is passed.

arguments.description: - (Optional, string) Description of the Floating IP.

arguments.floating_ip_id: - (Required, int) ID of the Floating IP.

arguments.server_id: - (Required, int) Server to assign the Floating IP to.

arguments.dns_ptr: - (Required, string) The DNS address the should resolve to.

arguments.ip_address: - (Required, string) The IP address that should point to .

arguments.server_id: - (Required, int) The server the belongs to.

arguments.floating_ip_id: - (Required, int) The Floating IP the belongs to.

arguments.ip_address: - (Optional, string) IP address of the Floating IP.

arguments.most_recent: - (Optional, bool) If more than one result is returned, use the most recent Image.

arguments.id: - (Optional, string) ID of the SSH Key.

arguments.name: - (Optional, string) Name of the SSH Key.

arguments.fingerprint: - (Optional, string) Fingerprint of the SSH Key.

arguments.selector: - Label Selector. For more information about possible values, visit the .
